item.title: What got this dark woofing and barking at servers
item.author: maddi@puppygirl.io (Maddi)
item.description: So you&rsquo;re still confused as to what the purpose of this whole site is. Well let me try to maybe explain it a bit. Frist, hi! I&rsquo;m Maddi. I am a total nerd when it comes to computers and technology as a whole. I have such an immense fascination with it that I have spent a majority of my life learning as much as I can about how things work.

item.title: What Is A Therian?
item.author: maddi@puppygirl.io (Maddi)
item.description: # So what is exactly is a &ldquo;Therian&rdquo;? More specifically what is therianthropy? And what is a therianthrope? Well according to the Therian Wiki The noun/term &rsquo;therianthropy&rsquo; is used to refer to the intrinsic experience surrounding someone&rsquo;s therian identity. It is the term used to encapsulate the broader experience, while the term &rsquo;therianthrope&rsquo; (someone who involuntarily identifies as a non-human animalistic creature) refers to the individual who experiences it.
